init.title: Settings
init.description: Settings to control the behaviour of this interface

data_description.cache_values: Hold on to sensor values, even when there is no data available.
data_description.fast_poll: Polling rate to use when actively getting data from the car.
data_description.slow_poll: Polling rate to use when the car is in range, but turned off.
data_description.xs_poll: Polling rate to use when the car is out of range. Home Assistant will listen for bluetooth advertisements and update immediately if the car comes back into range.
